item.title: Using Athena to convert individual JSON objects to Avro files
item.description: Back in September of 2019, AWS added support to Athena to enable Create Table as Select (CTAS) statements, as well as INSERT INTO statements. These statements allow the the results of a query to be used to construct a new table (CTAS) or appended to another table (INSERT INTO). This â€¦
